com.centurylink.mdw.slack

Class MessageMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.centurylink.mdw.slack.MessageMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RegisteredService, Monitor, ServiceMonitor

    @RegisteredService(value=ServiceMonitor.class)
public class MessageMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceMonitor
    Monitors for comment messages posted in MDW through its API(s).

      • onRequest

        public java.lang.Object onRequest(java.lang.Object request,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers)
                           throws ServiceException
        Description copied from interface: ServiceMonitor
        Called when the request comes in. Can change the incoming request contents. Currently must return null or a String.
        Specified by:
        onRequest in interface ServiceMonitor
        Parameters:
        request - Incoming request message content (String, XMLBean, JAXB Element, JSONObject, etc).
        headers - Incoming protocol header values. May be modified by the monitor.
        Returns:
        null, or an alternative request that should be passed on instead of the incoming request
        Throws:
        ServiceException

      • onHandle

        public java.lang.Object onHandle(java.lang.Object request,
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers)
                          throws ServiceException
        Description copied from interface: ServiceMonitor
        Called after onRequest(), but before the appropriate handler is determined. Can be used to short-circuit the request. Currently must return null or a String. Returning non-null from here bypasses onResponse() and other monitors' onHandle().
        Specified by:
        onHandle in interface ServiceMonitor
        Parameters:
        request - Incoming request message content (String, XMLBean, JAXB Element, JSONObject, etc).
        headers - protocol headers
        Returns:
        null, or an alternative response to send back to the service consumer
        Throws:
        ServiceException

      • onResponse

        public java.lang.Object onResponse(java.lang.Object response,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers)
                            throws ServiceException
        Description copied from interface: ServiceMonitor
        Called before the response is sent out from the MDW event handler or camel route. Currently must return null or a String.
        Specified by:
        onResponse in interface ServiceMonitor
        Parameters:
        response - Outgoing response message content (probably a String, XMLBean or JAXB Element)
        headers - Outbound protocol header values. May be modified by the monitor.
        Returns:
        null, or an alternative response to send back to the service consumer.
        Throws:
        ServiceException

        public java.lang.Object onError(java.lang.Throwable t,

        headers - service meta information
